activities.name: Nice Carnival
activities.description: The Nice Carnival is one of the world's major carnival events, held annually since the 13th century. The event features parades with giant floats, flower battles, and vibrant street performances.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring is when the Nice Carnival takes place, with the city coming alive with colors and festivities.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets in advance online as they sell out quickly. Arrive early to secure a good viewing spot.

activities.name: Promenade des Anglais
activities.description: A charming walk along the Mediterranean coast, offering stunning views and a chance to enjoy the mild spring weather.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring offers pleasant temperatures, making it ideal for a leisurely stroll along the promenade.
activities.booking_tips: No booking needed, but consider starting early in the morning to enjoy a quieter experience.

activities.name: Parc Phoenix
activities.description: Explore 7 hectares of botanical gardens and a tropical greenhouse with exotic plants and animals.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring flowers bloom throughout Parc Phoenix, offering a colorful and fragrant experience.
activities.booking_tips: Tickets can be purchased at the entrance. Consider visiting during weekdays to avoid crowds.

activities.name: Matisse Museum
activities.description: Dedicated to the works of Henri Matisse, this museum showcases a vast collection of the artist's paintings, sculptures, and engravings.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring showers make it an excellent time to explore indoor attractions like the Matisse Museum.
activities.booking_tips: Buy tickets online to skip the queue. Guided tours are available and recommended.

activities.name: Old Town (Vieux Nice)
activities.description: Wander through the narrow streets of Old Town, exploring its colorful buildings, vibrant markets, and charming cafes.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring weather is perfect for exploring the outdoor markets and enjoying al fresco dining.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required. Wear comfortable shoes for walking on cobblestone streets.

activities.name: Colline du Château
activities.description: This historic hilltop offers panoramic views of Nice and the Bay of Angels, with ruins of an ancient castle.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring is ideal for hiking up the hill, with cooler temperatures and blooming flowers.
activities.booking_tips: No booking necessary. Bring water and a camera for the stunning views.

activities.name: Cours Saleya Flower Market
activities.description: A vibrant open-air market in the heart of Nice, offering a wide array of fresh flowers, local produce, and artisanal goods.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring is the best time to see the market at its most colorful, with a stunning variety of flowers.
activities.booking_tips: Arrive early to avoid crowds and get the freshest selections.

activities.name: Villa Ephrussi de Rothschild
activities.description: A beautiful villa located on the Saint-Jean-Cap-Ferrat peninsula, featuring exquisite gardens and luxurious interior decor.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring brings the gardens to life, making it an ideal time to visit.
activities.booking_tips: Book tickets online for guided tours, especially during weekends.

activities.name: Nice Jazz Festival
activities.description: Held annually in July, the Nice Jazz Festival hosts international artists and offers a mix of genres in a vibrant atmosphere.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer nights are perfect for enjoying outdoor concerts under the stars.
activities.booking_tips: Tickets sell out fast, so book early online. Bring a picnic blanket and arrive early for good seating.

activities.name: Plage Beau Rivage
activities.description: A popular beach along the Promenade des Anglais with opportunities for sunbathing, swimming, and water sports.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer is the best time for beach activities, with warm sea temperatures and sunny skies.
activities.booking_tips: Sunbeds can be reserved in advance during peak season. Bring sunscreen and a hat.

activities.name: Water Sports at Saint-Laurent-du-Var
activities.description: Engage in thrilling water sports like jet skiing, parasailing, and paddleboarding on the Mediterranean Sea.
activities.seasonal_notes: The calm summer seas provide perfect conditions for water sports enthusiasts.
activities.booking_tips: Book activities online in advance for better rates and availability.

activities.name: Castle Hill Park
activities.description: Explore the lush greenery, waterfalls, and historical ruins at Castle Hill, offering breathtaking views of Nice.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer mornings are cooler and ideal for hiking and photography.
activities.booking_tips: No booking needed. Wear comfortable shoes and bring water.

activities.name: Les Grandes Tables de la Friche
activities.description: An open-air dining experience featuring gourmet meals with a focus on local and organic ingredients.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer evenings offer perfect weather for dining outdoors under the stars.
activities.booking_tips: Reservations are recommended, especially on weekends. Check their menu online in advance.

activities.name: Nice Observatory
activities.description: Located on Mont Gros, the observatory offers guided tours and night sky viewing sessions.
activities.seasonal_notes: Clear summer skies provide excellent conditions for stargazing.
activities.booking_tips: Advance booking is essential for night sessions. Bring a light jacket as it can be cool at night.

activities.name: Parc de la Colline du Château
activities.description: This park on Castle Hill offers lush gardens, waterfalls, and panoramic views of the city and coastline.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer afternoons are ideal for relaxing in the shade and enjoying the scenic views.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required. Bring a picnic to enjoy in the park.

activities.name: Canyoning in the Verdon Gorge
activities.description: Experience the thrill of canyoning in one of Europe's most beautiful gorges, with jumps, slides, and abseils.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer is the best season for canyoning, with warm weather and safe water levels.
activities.booking_tips: Book a guided tour with a local operator for safety and the best routes. Wear appropriate gear.

activities.name: Vendanges de Nice
activities.description: Celebrate the local wine harvest with tastings, music, and traditional dances in the vineyards surrounding Nice.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn is harvest season, making it the perfect time to enjoy local wine festivals.
activities.booking_tips: Consider joining a tour for easier access to vineyards and tastings.

activities.name: Nice Art Fair
activities.description: An annual event showcasing contemporary art from local and international artists at the Palais des Expositions.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn brings a focus on cultural events, and the art fair is a highlight of the season.
activities.booking_tips: Buy tickets online to skip queues. Check the schedule for special artist talks and workshops.

activities.name: Olive Harvest Tour
activities.description: Join a guided tour of local olive groves to learn about the harvesting process and enjoy tastings of fresh olive oil.
activities.seasonal_notes: The olive harvest occurs in autumn, offering a unique cultural experience.
activities.booking_tips: Book tours in advance as spots can be limited, especially during peak harvest times.

activities.name: Monastere de Cimiez
activities.description: Visit this ancient monastery surrounded by gardens, offering historical insights and peaceful surroundings.
activities.seasonal_notes: Cooler autumn weather is ideal for exploring historical sites.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required, but check opening hours as they may vary seasonally.

activities.name: Baie des Anges Cruise
activities.description: Enjoy a scenic cruise around the Bay of Angels, taking in the stunning coastline and crystal-clear waters.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn offers calmer seas and mild weather, perfect for a leisurely cruise.
activities.booking_tips: Book in advance during weekends. Bring a light jacket as it can be breezy on the water.

activities.name: Cours Saleya Antique Market
activities.description: Discover unique antiques and vintage treasures at this popular market held every Monday in Old Nice.
activities.seasonal_notes: The autumn market is less crowded, allowing for a more relaxed shopping experience.
activities.booking_tips: Arrive early for the best finds. No booking required.

activities.name: Nice Opera House
activities.description: Experience world-class performances in a stunning historical venue, with a diverse program of operas, ballets, and concerts.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn is a popular time for cultural performances, with a full schedule at the opera house.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online in advance for popular shows. Dress code may apply.

activities.name: Hiking in Mercantour National Park
activities.description: Explore the rugged beauty of Mercantour National Park with its diverse flora and fauna and stunning autumn foliage.
activities.seasonal_notes: The autumn colors make hiking in the park particularly beautiful.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required, but check trail conditions and weather forecasts before heading out.

activities.name: Christmas Village in Nice
activities.description: Experience the magic of the holiday season with a festive market, ice skating rink, and holiday-themed attractions.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter brings festive cheer to Nice with the annual Christmas Village.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required. Visit during weekdays to avoid crowds.

activities.name: Skiing in the Alps
activities.description: Just a short drive from Nice, enjoy skiing and snowboarding in the Alps at resorts like Isola 2000 and Auron.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter is the perfect time to hit the slopes in the nearby Alps.
activities.booking_tips: Book accommodations and ski passes in advance for the best rates.

activities.name: Carnival on Ice
activities.description: An annual event where the Nice Carnival comes to life on ice with performances, music, and costumes.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter transforms the carnival into a unique ice event.
activities.booking_tips: Tickets can be purchased online or at the venue. Dress warmly for the ice rink.

activities.name: Chagall Museum
activities.description: Discover the largest collection of works by Marc Chagall, focusing on his Biblical Message series.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter is a great time to explore indoor museums and cultural attractions.
activities.booking_tips: Avoid weekends for a quieter experience. Audio guides are available.

activities.name: Winter Hiking in the Esterel Mountains
activities.description: Explore the scenic trails of the Esterel Mountains, offering stunning views and a peaceful winter atmosphere.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter offers cooler temperatures and clear skies, perfect for hiking.
activities.booking_tips: Check weather conditions before heading out. No booking needed.

activities.name: Nice Acropolis
activities.description: Attend a variety of exhibitions, trade shows, and cultural events hosted at the Nice Acropolis.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter events are popular at this indoor venue, providing warmth and entertainment.
activities.booking_tips: Check the schedule online and book tickets for specific events in advance.

activities.name: Ice Skating at Place Masséna
activities.description: Enjoy ice skating in the heart of Nice at the outdoor rink set up during the winter season.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter is the only time the rink is available, offering a fun seasonal activity for all ages.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required, but arrive early to avoid long lines.

activities.name: Villa Kerylos
activities.description: A reconstruction of an ancient Greek villa, offering a unique insight into Greek architecture and design.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter is a quieter time to visit historical sites, with fewer tourists.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets in advance online, especially during holiday periods.
